SEARCH
Package com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.Services

Class ChatRoomService

java.lang.Object
com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.Services.ChatRoomService
@Service public class ChatRoomService extends Object
ChatRoomService handles chat room related actions such as creating, adding, and deleting chat rooms.

      name - the name of the chat room
      description - the description of the chat room
      isEnabled - the initial status of the chat room

      Returns:

    • addMessageToChatRoom

      time - the time the message was sent
